channel.title: Map data editing?
channel.description:
Hi moparscapians, I was wondering if anyone has found a simple way to edit map data so you can change and add new maps. I want to add new areas so I want to delete items like this.
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/mb1h95.jpg[/img]
To
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/160za0m.jpg[/img]
Any ideas?

item.title: Map data editing?
item.dc:creator: @xxxxxx_13 xxxxxx 13
item.description:
@xxxxxx_13 wrote:

In addition. If you just want to remove icons such as the smithing thing then you can replace the sprite using a Cache Editor. To completely remove it you can just add a 1x1 invisible pixel and viola it appears to be gone.

Read full topic

item.title: Map data editing?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

like remove the smithing icon?

or edit the actual map (wall and all)

if you want to edit the map itself, people have released some basic map editors, but they are basic and you wont get too much accomplished with them unless you absolutely know what your doing.

Read full topic
